message: Bob, I'm offering you this amazing product for $11,000. It's worth every penny and I know you'll be happy with it. What do you say?
I'm very interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer. I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is still a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's try to make this work!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,500 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,000, which is my absolute bottom line.  It's a fair price for a product that will be of great value to you. Let's close this deal!
I'm getting close to buying from John, but I still want to try to negotiate with you. I'm willing to pay $9,750 for the product. This is my final offer, so I hope we can meet in the middle now.
